evidence.claim: Navion uses AWS cloud services for its infrastructure.
Their platforms support FHIR and HL7 for health data interoperability.
Navion integrates with electronic health records (EHRs) using API patterns.
The company complies with HIPAA regulations for health data handling.
Navion's data exchange capabilities include X12 EDI transaction sets.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of using X12 or specific health data exchange use cases found.
